rooms.name: Entrance Hall

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open plan space combining modern aesthetics with comfort. Large windows on the east wall for natural light in alignment with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen

rooms.name: Library
